parsed.plot: DEV: Rance and Talia consummated relationship in cottage; Talia lost virginity; intense physical and emotional connection established; meeting with Selenay approaches. PEND: How to present their partnership to Queen; managing dual nature of their bond (political/personal); Talia must compose herself for royal meeting; physical evidence of intimacy.

entities.c: STANCE-Rance: Deeply bonded beyond politics—surrendered completely; discovered submissive desires contrary to public persona; virginity taken; marked (bite bruise on breast); filled with his seed. Transformation complete: no longer untouched Queen's Own maintaining careful distance, now claimed woman who degraded herself willingly (called herself 'Holderkin slut/vessel/hole'); experienced first orgasms; found liberation in surrender of control after years carrying kingdom's burdens. Conflict between dignity/duty and awakened needs resolved through compartmentalization—can separate lover-self from diplomat-self. Decided to propose formalized partnership to Selenay (co-advisors known to Circle, hidden from public); reasoning: embrace unprecedented situation as strength rather than hide vulnerability. Physical state: sore from rough first intercourse; virgin blood and semen evidence requiring cleanup before meeting Queen. Emotional state: profound gratitude; transformed but maintaining composure through discipline.

Witnessed/experienced through bond Rance's intimacy with Talia despite attempting privacy; maintained physical guard outside cottage. STANCE-Rance: Resigned acceptance of complications; concerned about timing/propriety but understands Talia's need; dry humor about situation ('at least no one can accuse you of being predictable'); cautioned about untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam). Observations: Talia discovering aspects of self hidden even in memory-merge; finding release in surrender after years of responsibility; relationship settles question of what they are to each other. Pragmatic focus on approaching Selenay meeting.
Untrained Mage-Gift: telekinetically slammed door and closed curtains (used excessive force; channels still raw from trauma-breaking); Senta warned about danger.
